formatted_in_depth_analysis.statement: Smaller Pt nanoparticles exhibit higher ORR mass activity but lower durability due to atomic dissolution and particle size increase.
Controlling the coordination number and surface oxidation of Pt nanoparticles enhances durability by mitigating atomic dissolution.
